span.strong: * Information about free and reduced lunch during remote learning *

a.title: Go to comments for Community Update

br.span: Kingsway Regional School District invited East Greenwich Township School District to participate in a grant application to fund the cost of a school district feasibility consolidation study. The grant is funded by the New Jersey Department of Community Affairs Local Efficiency Achievement Program (LEAP), and if the grant is approved, the consolidation study would be conducted at no cost to our district. Click here for the full letter from our Superintendet.

a.title: Go to comments for LEAP letter
